title: If You’re Obsessed, You’re Doomed - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Harem   Mystery   Romance   School Life
tags: Academy   Amnesia   Aristocracy   Based on a Visual Novel   Beautiful Female Lead   Empires   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Male Yandere   Nobles   Otome Game   Possessive Characters   Reverse Harem   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Tsundere
author: 특급환상배송
description:
I woke up in an unfamiliar place.
In the midst of the confusion, the mobile phone became my only milestone.

To regain lost memories, it was necessary to win the favor of targets and achieve a special ending.

I worked hard with targets, increasing sympathy.
At first glance, everything was going smoothly.
Until a new notification popped up.

「Targets are assigned up to 5 marks of sympathy.
Starting from 6 — overheat, the chances of encountering an extreme ending are high.」

‘How many… hearts were there?’
While I was trying to check the system window, the sound of footsteps was getting closer.

「A target has been detected nearby.」

I have to run. Now…

「▷ Sympathy: ♡♡♡♡ (They like you. They will always try to find you.)」>
